attributes.action: TRAFFIC  AND HOUSING REDUCTION IN MATLOCK IF RING ROAD IS PROVIDED
attributes.additional_details: STOP THE GOVERNMENT FROM BUILDING SO MANY HOUSES UNNECESSARILY IN RURAL AREA'S. FOR EXAMPLE  "A RING ROAD ROUND THE EDGE OF MATLOCK WITH THE HOUSING BEING BUILT THERE. THIS WOULD PREVENT MATLOCKS BEAUTY FROM BEING DESTROYED AND REDUCE AND PREVENT THE TRAFFIC CHAOS WE FREQUENTLY ALREADY HAVE FROM BEING INCREASED".
